raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice that Nuclear and Hydroelectric stayed the same in terms of energy, and it’s decently clean. I noticed that Gas and Coal increased a lot. 
What do you wonder?
I wonder why our coal production is going down, could this be because of different sources of energy? Could this be because company’s care more about the environment?
How does this relate to you and your community?
This relates to me and my community because we are starting to feel the effects of climate change. 
Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
A catchy headline would be “Should Electric Cars Be Mandatory?”
ace_sentences: I notice that nuclear energy stayed the same.
I notice that hydroelectric energy stayed the same.
I notice that gas increased a lot.
I notice that coal increased a lot.
I wonder why our coal production is going down.
Different energy sources may cause the decrease of our coal production.
Companies may care more about the environment.
If companies care more about the environment, then our coal production may decrease.
This relates to me and my community.
My community feels the effects of climate change.
The headline is: Should electric cars be mandatory?
